item.content:encoded: Graphic: Polygon Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs coming to the Switch in 2024 Nintendo will broadcast a new Nintendo Direct presentation on Wednesday, Feb. 21, a showcase focused Switch games coming in the first half of 2024, the company announced Monday. The new Nintendo Direct starts at 9 a.m. EST/6 a.m. PST, and will run about 25 minutes, Nintendo says. Wednesday‚Äôs Direct will be viewable on Nintendo‚Äôs YouTube and Twitch channels. The presentation be on-demand, meaning the entire showcase will go live at onc...

item.title: What‚Äôs going on with all these video game industry layoffs? | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Nikos Pekiaridis/NurPhoto via Getty Images We asked experts to size up what‚Äôs already a volatile year The video game industry has never been known for its job security. Game development works...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Nikos Pekiaridis/NurPhoto via Getty Images We asked experts to size up what‚Äôs already a volatile year The video game industry has never been known for its job security. Game development works in cycles, and when games are released and projects end, people are often laid off. When the next project starts, hiring begins once again only for another potential cut down the line. It was hard for video game developers to feel comfortable in their positions before the most recent period of unpr...

item.title: Prompt Engineering: An Integrated Dream | KDnuggets
item.description: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just ano...
item.content:encoded: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just another internet pipe dream? Let's ditch the sensationalism and delve into the actual job market data to find out.

item.title: Bandle Tale is the lower-stakes League of Legends story we all deserve | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Lazy Bear Games/Riot Forge What if League was way more like Stardew Valley? League of Legends is a competitive game that demands concentration, focus, and knowledge of both the champion and t...
item.content:encoded: Image: Lazy Bear Games/Riot Forge What if League was way more like Stardew Valley? League of Legends is a competitive game that demands concentration, focus, and knowledge of both the champion and the map. By contrast, Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story is a cheerful crafting RPG that‚Äôs equal parts whimsical and satisfying. Bandle Tale stars a Yordle, a furry little fae-style creature who lives in the realm of Bandle City. A party goes haywire, and the portal network connecting the islands...

item.content:encoded: Image: CD Projekt Red They‚Äôre no longer just distractions; they‚Äôre practically essential These days, when you buy a game, there‚Äôs a good chance you get something extra. Whether we‚Äôre talking large AAA releases or indie titles, minigames are all the rage ‚Äî and a few have taken on new life after release. item.content:encoded: Image: Nintendo Just hold on a little longer, Switch fans! The wait for Nintendo‚Äôs next-gen console may have just gotten a little longer. According to multiple reports, Nintendo now plans to launch its Switch successor in the first quarter of 2025 ‚Äî or about eight years after it launched the original Nintendo Switch. Brazilian journalist Pedro Henrique Lutti Lippe, citing multiple sources, reported Friday in a new video that Nintendo recently briefed publishers on an updated launch window for ...

item.description: Image: Arzest, Sonic Team/Sega Now make them kiss It seems like Sonic the Hedgehog is always finding ways to one-up his rival and frenemy, Shadow. This time, it‚Äôs dashing around Sonic Superstars whi...
item.content:encoded: Image: Arzest, Sonic Team/Sega Now make them kiss It seems like Sonic the Hedgehog is always finding ways to one-up his rival and frenemy, Shadow. This time, it‚Äôs dashing around Sonic Superstars while wearing a onesie that makes him look exactly like his black and red counterpart. The new costume looks like some sort of cosmic horror, and its reveal prompted a wave of responses online making jokes about Sonic‚Äôs terrifying but hilarious new look. The onesie basically transforms Sonic into Shado...

item.title: Learning the importance of training data under concept drift | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the development of AI models. Often, models are trained on longitudinal data with the hope that the training data used will accurately represent inputs the model may receive in the future. More generally, the default assumption that all training data are equally relevant often breaks in practice. For e...

item.title: Semantic Layers are the Missing Piece for AI-Enabled Analytics | KDnuggets
item.description: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast res...
item.content:encoded: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast responses and reports based on their data. Leveraging AI and semantic layers is advancing business intelligence, making it easier than ever for people to interact with data.

DP offers a robust solution to address growing concerns about data protection, enabling technologies across industries and government applications (e.g., the US census) without compromising individual user identities.
